metadata.title: USN-5390-2 -- Linux kernel (Raspberry Pi) vulnerabilities
metadata.description: David Bouman discovered that the netfilter subsystem in the Linux kernel did not properly validate passed user register indices. A local attacker could use this to cause a denial of service or possibly execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2022-1015)  David Bouman discovered that the netfilter subsystem in the Linux kernel did not initialize memory in some situations. A local attacker could use this to expose sensitive information (kernel memory). (CVE-2022-1016)  It was discovered that the ST21NFCA NFC driver in the Linux kernel did not properly validate the size of certain data in EVT_TRANSACTION events. A physically proximate attacker could use this to cause a denial of service (system crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code. (CVE-2022-26490)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5390-2` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  linux-headers-5.15.0-1006-raspi-nolpae - 5.15.0-1006.6 linux-modules-extra-5.15.0-1006-raspi - 5.15.0-1006.6 linux-tools-5.15.0-1006-raspi-nolpae - 5.15.0-1006.6 linux-modules-5.15.0-1006-raspi-nolpae - 5.15.0-1006.6 linux-headers-5.15.0-1006-raspi - 5.15.0-1006.6 linux-raspi-tools-5.15.0-1006 - 5.15.0-1006.6 linux-buildinfo-5.15.0-1006-raspi-nolpae - 5.15.0-1006.6 linux-image-5.15.0-1006-raspi-nolpae - 5.15.0-1006.6 linux-buildinfo-5.15.0-1006-raspi - 5.15.0-1006.6 linux-raspi-headers-5.15.0-1006 - 5.15.0-1006.6 linux-modules-5.15.0-1006-raspi - 5.15.0-1006.6 linux-tools-5.15.0-1006-raspi - 5.15.0-1006.6 linux-image-5.15.0-1006-raspi - 5.15.0-1006.6 linux-modules-extra-5.15.0-1006-raspi-nolpae - 5.15.0-1006.6 No subscription required  linux-tools-raspi - 5.15.0.1006.6 linux-modules-extra-raspi-nolpae - 5.15.0.1006.6 linux-tools-raspi-nolpae - 5.15.0.1006.6 linux-headers-raspi-nolpae - 5.15.0.1006.6 linux-image-raspi-nolpae - 5.15.0.1006.6 linux-image-raspi - 5.15.0.1006.6 linux-modules-extra-raspi - 5.15.0.1006.6 linux-raspi-nolpae - 5.15.0.1006.6 linux-raspi - 5.15.0.1006.6 linux-headers-raspi - 5.15.0.1006.6 No subscription required
